name: Chaos Diner
description:
'Chaos Diner' is made in around 3 hours for Trijam 193 with the theme of 'Patience'.

Unfortunately, I couldn't add sound effects or music cause I didn't have enough time. I am so sorry for this.

Gameplay:

You are a restaurant worker and your customers are very impatient, So you have to be quick to take their orders by moving near them and clicking the 'Interact' button. And go to the ingredients and click the 'Interact' button to add them to the order. After you are done with the order go to the customer and click the  'Interact' button to finish the order.

Controls:

W, A, S, D = Move

E or Mouse Left Click = Interact 

Used Assets:

Interior Assets: https://gif-superretroworld.itch.io/interior-pack

Characters: https://elv-games.itch.io/free-retro-game-world-sprites
